class.name: BaseRuleFactoryTest

javadoc.text: Tests that a given rule rule will be computed and added once to the cache * whatever the number of times this rule is called concurrently.

method.name: testConcurrentCreation
method.comment: Number of times the same rule will be called.
Ensure that all computations have completed.
Assertion would fail if "getRuleInternal" were not "synchronized".

method.name: computeRule
method.comment: Tracks whether this computation has been called more than once.
